title: Easy Fried Crab Cakes with Mustard Sauce

Ingredients.8: 0.5 teaspoon seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®)

Ingredients.11: 5 dashes hot sauce, or more to taste

Ingredients.12: 1 (6 ounce) pouch cooked lump crabmeat, drained

Ingredients.20: 1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed

Directions.1: Stir bread crumbs, mayonnaise, beaten egg, onion, parsley, Worcestershire sauce, seafood seasoning, dry mustard, seasoned pepper, and hot sauce in a medium bowl until well combined. Gently fold in crabmeat. Cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes.

Directions.2: Meanwhile, make the sauce: Whisk mayonnaise, sour cream, mustard, lemon juice, and Worcestershire sauce together in a small bowl.

Directions.3: Shape crabmeat mixture into 5 to 6 small patties.

Directions.4: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook patties in the hot oil until golden brown, about 3 minutes on each side.
